text:
@trom771 Praying will work as a cure for covid-19 about as well as it worked out in "Pray Them Straight" anti-gay movement @VP was so fond of. 
#Pence is such a sanctimonious Pharisee slimeball. Reminds me of Mr. Haney on Green Acres. Or a predatory used car salesman.
